EmailTemplate.name: 18-Expand business-WAN Conn. SPaaP-Email-Pre_event email-T003SP.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit Nuage Networks at Open Infrastructure Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Open Infrastructure Summit Colorado Convention Center | April 29 - May 1, 2019 Join Nuage Networks and thousands of IT decision makers, operators and developers to collaborate on common use cases and solving real problems at this year’s Open Infrastructure Summit <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/denver-2019]]>. Where you can find us: Booth # A6 – Learn how Nuage Networks <[[http://www.nuagenetworks.net/]]> is partnering with commercial OpenStack vendors and see a demonstration of our SDN platform. Contact us <[[http://www.nuagenetworks.net/about-our-company/contact-us/]]> to schedule a demo or drop by our booth during marketplace hours. Breakout Session – Highly Efficient Edge Cloud Data Center for 5G <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/denver-2019/summit-schedule/events/23494/highly-efficient-edge-cloud-data-center-for-5g]]> April 29, 4:40pm – 5:20pm Presented by Mellanox and Nuage Networks Marketplace Theatre Session – Telco Cloud Data Plane Acceleration for VNFs and CNFs <[[https://www.openstack.org/summit/denver-2019/summit-schedule/events/23809/telco-cloud-data-plane-acceleration-for-vnfs-and-cnfs]]> May 1, 9:30am – 9:50am
Hope to see you there! © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/nuagenetworks]]>
